item.title: Deutsche Bank’s DWS Moves Star Hire Kelly Out of Management
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- DWS Group alternatives head Paul Kelly is stepping aside from his role after just two years in charge of the key division at Deutsche Bank AG’s investment arm. The former Blackstone Inc. executive will become chairman of the €110 billion ($120 billion) unit from April 1, focusing on ...
